security_audit.summary: This is an official skill template with minimal content. No executable code, scripts, or external integrations are present.

content.value_statement: You need a starting point for a new skill file. This template provides the required metadata and structure.
actual_capabilities: Provides a SKILL.md file with frontmatter fields
Includes placeholder name and description metadata
Supplies marketplace entry metadata in JSON
Defines a plugin manifest with version and license
limitations: No real instructions are included in SKILL.md
No automation or scripts are provided
No examples or test prompts are included

use_cases.title: Start a new skill
use_cases.description: Use the template to draft a new SKILL.md quickly.

use_cases.title: Standardize templates
use_cases.description: Share a consistent base file for internal skills.

use_cases.title: Draft metadata
use_cases.description: Capture name and description before writing full guidance.

prompt_templates.title: Basic metadata
prompt_templates.prompt: Fill in the name and description in SKILL.md for a skill that summarizes incident reports.

prompt_templates.title: Trigger guidance
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a short instruction section that explains when this skill should be triggered.

prompt_templates.title: Audience focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Add instructions tailored for support engineers who use the skill each day.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Extend the instruction section with clear steps and constraints for a multi tool workflow.

output_examples.input: Create a short description for a log analysis helper skill.
output: Description explains it summarizes logs and highlights errors
Instruction section notes when to trigger the skill

best_practices: Keep the description specific and trigger focused
Document clear steps in the instruction section
Review metadata for accuracy before publishing
anti_patterns: Using vague descriptions that overlap other skills
Claiming capabilities that are not defined

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude and Codex?
faq.answer: Yes, it is a generic template and works for Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What limits does this template have?
faq.answer: It only provides structure and metadata, not full instructions or logic.

faq.question: Can I integrate it with other skills?
faq.answer: Yes, you can reference it and extend it within your own skill files.

faq.question: Does it handle or store user data?
faq.answer: No, it contains only static text and metadata.

faq.question: What should I do if the skill does not trigger?
faq.answer: Clarify the description to state when the skill should be used.

faq.question: How does it compare to a full skill?
faq.answer: This is a scaffold, while a full skill includes detailed workflows.
